text: William Best Evans (September 13, 1932 â€“ November 22, 2020) was an American basketball player. He competed in the 1956 Summer Olympics. He was born in Berea, Kentucky. Evans played collegiately at the University of Kentucky. He was part of the United States basketball team which won the gold medal in 1956. Evans died on November 22, 2020 at the age of 88.UK Athletics Hall of Famer Billy Evans Dead at 88 ==References== Category:1932 births Category:2020 deaths Category:American basketball players Category:Guards (basketball) Category:Medalists at the 1956 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic gold medalists for the United States Category:Sportspeople from Kentucky
title: Billy Evans (basketball, born 1932)
